tidbits.title: Rich Oil Reserves
tidbits.description: Brunei is blessed with significant oil reserves, contributing to its status as one of the wealthiest nations, with a high standard of living for its citizens.

tidbits.title: Islamic Culture
tidbits.description: Brunei embraces Islamic traditions and culture, with grand mosques, Islamic art, and adherence to Sharia law, influencing various aspects of daily life.

tidbits.title: Conservation Efforts
tidbits.description: Despite its wealth, Brunei is dedicated to preserving its natural environment, with vast areas of pristine rainforest and wildlife sanctuaries protected for conservation.
